name: Rythm Snake
description:
Rhythm Snake is a 2D game that is inspired by Dancing Line by Cheetah Games. The game was released on IOS and Android in December 2016. It is a casual rhythm game where players need to avoid obstacles while tapping to the beat. Each level use it’s own music and it contains 10 collectable diamonds that is placed at the challenging part of the music. Depending on the music’s intensity, each level has it’s own difficulty.

 

Players are playing as a snake that start to move automatically once the level is loaded and the button is pressed for the first time. The snake can only turn left and right, so players can only turn the snake once the lane turns, which follows the timing of the beat. Players need to stay in the lane and avoid hitting the obstacles until the end of the music.
